DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Implementation Expanded Carrier Screening Before Pregnancy Hong Kong
DOC.detailed_description: This study recruit 50 couple Expanded carrier screen Prepregnancy Checkup Clinic Family Planning Association . Saliva swab collect couple Hereditary Disease DNA screen test DrGene . Blood sample take venipuncture woman Fragile X carrier screen Prenatal Diagnostic Laboratory , Tsan Yuk Hospital . A pre-test self-administered Questionnaire 1 administer couple assess knowledge , view preference receive expand carrier screen . This include collection basic demographic information , answer question basic principle expand carrier test , reason decline test , choice concurrent sequential screening , factor affect choice , anxiety level patient assess state-trait anxiety inventory . Their willingness pay test also assess . The test result available couple 6 week 's time . A post-test self-administered questionnaire 2 administer couple receive test result clinic . These include assessment anxiety level , decision regret , outcome test result action . The couple screen positive result refer Queen Mary Hospital joint counsel clinical geneticist gynaecologist . This counselling/consultation shall audiotaped videotaped . The interview transcribe verbatim . The data explore theme issue identify . Statistics Questionnaire survey data shall enter SPSS . Descriptive statistic use compare response choices participant .
